creator: marc.hild@st.com
text:
Program aborts on startssl. Apache built on a SunFire V210 SunOS 5.8
Is there a workaround ? Anything to do with --disable-ipv6 ?

 ##  Apache 2.0.54 successfully built and installed as a dynamic
 ##  server with the following configuration options :
 ##   --prefix=/home/httpwiw/apache/2.0.54
 ##   --with-port=80
 ##   --enable-mods-shared=all
 ##   --with-ssl=/home/httpwiw/openssl/0.9.8/
 ##   --enable-ssl
 ##   --with-ldap
 ##   --with-auth-ldap
 ##   --with-ldap-lib=/home/httpwiw/openldap/2.2.26/lib
 ##   --with-ldap-include=/home/httpwiw/openldap/2.2.26/include
 ##   --enable-ldap
 ##   --enable-auth-ldap
 ##   --disable-auth_digest
 ##   --disable-ipv6

This is essentially the same problem as bug 27525 -- a resolver which is not
configured properly.  Follow the instructions in bug 27525 comment 8.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 27525 ***
creator: jorton@redhat.com
